items.sentence: Tom is much shorter than all of his classmates.
Tom is having the same problems Mary is having.
Tom is going to find out what needs to be done.
Tom is going to do what Mary said he should do.
Tom is going to do things the way we suggested.
Tom is going to be meeting Mary in three hours.
Tom is doing exactly what Mary asked him to do.
Tom invited me to his party, but I'm not going.
Tom has two brothers. Both of them are doctors.
Tom has already told Mary what she ought to do.
